alert.note: Alert for Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 3:50PM EDT until June 16 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Person County in central North Carolina... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 349 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hamer, or near Yanceyville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Roxboro, Concord, Hyco Marina, Bushy Fork and Hyco Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
